fields.value: How To Share Your Driving Licence Information?

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Follow this guide to provide detail on your driving entitlements and any endorsements such as when applying for a job or hiring a vehicle.
Step 1 - Visit the online Portal.
Go to https://www.viewdrivingrecord.service.gov.uk/driving-record/licence-number
Step 2 - Enter the required details.
Now enter driving licence number, national insurance number and postcode write on your current driving licence. Tick on the box when you have read the privacy policy and then click on View button.
Step 3 - Share your licence information.
Your driving licence will be displayed on the screen. To share your driving licence information, select the “Share your licence information” tab.
Step 4 - Create a code.
Click on the "create a code" button.
Step 5 - Get a code.
You will now be shown a check code which is case sensitive. Pass this check code onto whoever needs to view your driving licence. You will also need to provide them with the last 8 characters of your driving licence number.
Note: This check code is valid for 21 days and can only be used once.
Step 6 - Download your driving licence information.
Now you can also download a detail of your driving licence by clicking ‘View, print or save your licence information’.
If you need more information, contact to the dvla customer service for help.
